member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Allows customization of the proc stat file path to allow testing this on Non-Linux machines

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser
member.summary: Provides a string parser that may be used instead of String.Split to avoid unnecessary string and array allocations.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.buffer
member.summary: The string being parsed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.separator
member.summary: The separator character used to separate subcomponents of the larger string.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.skipEmpty
member.summary: true if empty subcomponents should be skipped; false to treat them as valid entries.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.endIndex
member.summary: The ending index that represents the next index after the last character that's part of the current entry.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.startIndex
member.summary: The starting index from which to parse the current entry.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.#ctor(System.String,System.Char,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initialize the StringParser.
member.param: The separator character used to separate subcomponents of .
true if empty subcomponents should be skipped; false to treat them as valid entries. Defaults to false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.ExtractCurrent
member.summary: Gets the current subcomponent of the string as a string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.ExtractCurrentToEnd
member.summary: Gets the current subcomponent and all remaining components of the string as a string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.MoveAndExtractNext
member.summary: Moves to the next component of the string and returns it as a string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.MoveAndExtractNextInOuterParens
member.summary: Moves to the next component of the string, which must be enclosed in the only set of top-level parentheses in the string. The extracted value will be everything between (not including) those parentheses.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.MoveNext
member.summary: Moves to the next component of the string.
member.returns: true if there is a next component to be parsed; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.MoveNextOrFail
member.summary: Moves to the next component of the string. If there isn't one, it throws an exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.ParseNextChar
member.summary: Moves to the next component and parses it as a Char.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.ParseNextInt32
member.summary: Moves to the next component and parses it as an Int32.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.ParseNextInt64
member.summary: Moves to the next component and parses it as an Int64.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.ParseNextUInt32
member.summary: Moves to the next component and parses it as a UInt32.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.ParseNextUInt64
member.summary: Moves to the next component and parses it as a UInt64.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.ParseRaw``1(Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.ParseRawFunc{``0})
member.summary: Moves to the next component and hands the raw buffer and indexing data to a selector function that can validate and return the appropriate data from the component.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions.ProcStatFileParser.StringParser.ThrowForInvalidData
member.summary: Throws unconditionally for invalid data.

member.summary: Initializes a new reusable reader.

The size of the buffer to use when reading from the stream.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.DiagnosticCounter
member.summary: DiagnosticCounter is an abstract class that serves as the parent class for various Counter* classes, namely EventCounter, PollingCounter, IncrementingEventCounter, and IncrementingPollingCounter.

member.param: Additional metadata associated with this counter instance

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.DiagnosticCounter.Publish
member.summary: Adds the counter to the set that the EventSource will report on.
member.remarks: Must only be invoked once, and only after the instance has been fully initialized. This should be invoked by a derived type's ctor as the last thing it does.

member.summary: Cleans up all resources used by this instance

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PollingCounter
member.summary: PollingCounter is a variant of EventCounter - it collects and calculates similar statistics as EventCounter. PollingCounter differs from EventCounter in that it takes in a callback function to collect metrics on its own rather than the user having to call WriteMetric() every time.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PollingCounter.#ctor(System.String,System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource,System.Func{System.Double},System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. PollingCounter live as long as the EventSource that they are attached to unless they are explicitly Disposed.
member.param: The delegate to invoke to get the current metric value.
Additional context associated with this counter instance

member.summary: Gets a textual summary for this counter instance
member.returns: A textual summary for this counter instance

member.summary: This is the payload that is sent in the with EventSource.Write

member.summary: Replace ties with their mean (non-integer ranks). Default.

member.summary: Replace ties with their minimum (typical sports ranking).

member.summary: Replace ties with their maximum.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.RankDefinition.First

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics
member.summary: Statistics operating on an array already sorted ascendingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.EmpiricalCDF(System.Span{System.Double},System.Double)
member.summary: Estimates the empirical cumulative distribution function (CDF) at x from the sorted data array (ascending).
member.param: The value where to estimate the CDF at.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.FiveNumberSummary(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates {min, lower-quantile, median, upper-quantile, max} from the sorted data array (ascending). Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8).
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.InterquartileRange(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the inter-quartile range from the sorted data array (ascending). Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8).
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.LowerQuartile(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the first quartile value from the sorted data array (ascending). Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8).
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.Maximum(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Returns the largest value from the sorted data array (ascending).
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.Median(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the median value from the sorted data array (ascending). Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8).
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.Minimum(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Returns the smallest value from the sorted data array (ascending).
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.OrderStatistic(System.Span{System.Double},System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the order statistic (order 1..N) from the sorted data array (ascending).
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.
One-based order of the statistic, must be between 1 and N (inclusive).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.Percentile(System.Span{System.Double},System.Int32)
member.summary: Estimates the p-Percentile value from the sorted data array (ascending). If a non-integer Percentile is needed, use Quantile instead. Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8).
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.Quantile(System.Span{System.Double},System.Double)
member.summary: Estimates the tau-th quantile from the sorted data array (ascending). The tau-th quantile is the data value where the cumulative distribution function crosses tau. Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8).
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.
member.remarks: R-8, SciPy-(1/3,1/3): Linear interpolation of the approximate medians for order statistics. When tau < (2/3) / (N + 1/3), use x1. When tau >= (N - 1/3) / (N + 1/3), use xN.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.QuantileCustom(System.Span{System.Double},System.Double,Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition)
member.summary: Estimates the tau-th quantile from the sorted data array (ascending). The tau-th quantile is the data value where the cumulative distribution function crosses tau. The quantile definition can be specified to be compatible with an existing system.
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.
Quantile definition, to choose what product/definition it should be consistent with

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SortedSpanStatistics.UpperQuartile(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the third quartile value from the sorted data array (ascending). Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8).
member.param: Sample array, must be sorted ascendingly.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics
member.summary: Statistics operating on arrays assumed to be unsorted. WARNING: Methods with the Inplace-suffix may modify the data array by reordering its entries.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.Covariance(System.Span{System.Double},System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the unbiased population covariance from the provided two sample arrays. On a dataset of size N will use an N-1 normalizer (Bessel's correction). Returns NaN if data has less than two entries or if any entry is NaN.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.FiveNumberSummaryInplace(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates {min, lower-quantile, median, upper-quantile, max} from the unsorted data array. Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8). WARNING: Works inplace and can thus causes the data array to be reordered.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed. Will be reordered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.GeometricMean(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates the geometric mean of the unsorted data array. Returns NaN if data is empty or any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.HarmonicMean(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates the harmonic mean of the unsorted data array. Returns NaN if data is empty or any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.InterquartileRangeInplace(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the inter-quartile range from the unsorted data array. Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8). WARNING: Works inplace and can thus causes the data array to be reordered.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed. Will be reordered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.LowerQuartileInplace(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the first quartile value from the unsorted data array. Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8). WARNING: Works inplace and can thus causes the data array to be reordered.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed. Will be reordered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.Maximum(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Returns the largest value from the unsorted data array. Returns NaN if data is empty or any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.MaximumAbsolute(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Returns the largest absolute value from the unsorted data array. Returns NaN if data is empty or any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.Mean(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the arithmetic sample mean from the unsorted data array. Returns NaN if data is empty or any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.MeanStandardDeviation(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the arithmetic sample mean and the unbiased population standard deviation from the provided samples as unsorted array. On a dataset of size N will use an N-1 normalizer (Bessel's correction). Returns NaN for mean if data is empty or any entry is NaN and NaN for standard deviation if data has less than two entries or if any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.MeanVariance(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the arithmetic sample mean and the unbiased population variance from the provided samples as unsorted array. On a dataset of size N will use an N-1 normalizer (Bessel's correction). Returns NaN for mean if data is empty or any entry is NaN and NaN for variance if data has less than two entries or if any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.MedianInplace(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the median value from the unsorted data array. WARNING: Works inplace and can thus causes the data array to be reordered.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed. Will be reordered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.Minimum(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Returns the smallest value from the unsorted data array. Returns NaN if data is empty or any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.MinimumAbsolute(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Returns the smallest absolute value from the unsorted data array. Returns NaN if data is empty or any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.OrderStatisticInplace(System.Span{System.Double},System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the order statistic (order 1..N) from the unsorted data array. WARNING: Works inplace and can thus causes the data array to be reordered.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed. Will be reordered.
One-based order of the statistic, must be between 1 and N (inclusive).

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.PercentileInplace(System.Span{System.Double},System.Int32)
member.summary: Estimates the p-Percentile value from the unsorted data array. If a non-integer Percentile is needed, use Quantile instead. Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8). WARNING: Works inplace and can thus causes the data array to be reordered.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed. Will be reordered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.PopulationCovariance(System.Span{System.Double},System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates the population covariance from the full population provided as two arrays. On a dataset of size N will use an N normalizer and would thus be biased if applied to a subset. Returns NaN if data is empty or if any entry is NaN.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.PopulationStandardDeviation(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates the population standard deviation from the full population provided as unsorted array. On a dataset of size N will use an N normalizer and would thus be biased if applied to a subset. Returns NaN if data is empty or if any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.PopulationVariance(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates the population variance from the full population provided as unsorted array. On a dataset of size N will use an N normalizer and would thus be biased if applied to a subset. Returns NaN if data is empty or if any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.QuantileCustomInplace(System.Span{System.Double},System.Double,Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition)
member.summary: Estimates the tau-th quantile from the unsorted data array. The tau-th quantile is the data value where the cumulative distribution function crosses tau. The quantile definition can be specified to be compatible with an existing system. WARNING: Works inplace and can thus causes the data array to be reordered.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed. Will be reordered.
Quantile definition, to choose what product/definition it should be consistent with

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.QuantileInplace(System.Span{System.Double},System.Double)
member.summary: Estimates the tau-th quantile from the unsorted data array. The tau-th quantile is the data value where the cumulative distribution function crosses tau. Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8). WARNING: Works inplace and can thus causes the data array to be reordered.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed. Will be reordered.
member.remarks: R-8, SciPy-(1/3,1/3): Linear interpolation of the approximate medians for order statistics. When tau < (2/3) / (N + 1/3), use x1. When tau >= (N - 1/3) / (N + 1/3), use xN.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.RootMeanSquare(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the root mean square (RMS) also known as quadratic mean from the unsorted data array. Returns NaN if data is empty or any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.StandardDeviation(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the unbiased population standard deviation from the provided samples as unsorted array. On a dataset of size N will use an N-1 normalizer (Bessel's correction). Returns NaN if data has less than two entries or if any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.UpperQuartileInplace(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the third quartile value from the unsorted data array. Approximately median-unbiased regardless of the sample distribution (R8). WARNING: Works inplace and can thus causes the data array to be reordered.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed. Will be reordered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.SpanStatistics.Variance(System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Estimates the unbiased population variance from the provided samples as unsorted array. On a dataset of size N will use an N-1 normalizer (Bessel's correction). Returns NaN if data has less than two entries or if any entry is NaN.
member.param: Sample array, no sorting is assumed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.LogValuesFormatterExtended

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PercentilesEventCounter
member.summary:
Provides the ability to collect statistics through EventSource
See https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.Tracing/documentation/EventCounterTutorial.md for a tutorial guide.
See https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.Tracing/tests/BasicEventSourceTest/TestEventCounter.cs which shows tests, which are also useful in seeing actual use.
Initializes a new instance of the class. EVentCounters live as long as the EventSource that they are attached to unless they are explicitly Disposed.
member.param: The memory pool that should be used to acquire buffers by this counter instance

The number of raw signal values that can be buffer by this counter before flushing. This should ideally be high enough to allow reasonable calculation of percentiles - like when you request 99th percentile it doesn't make sense to allow only 50 raw signal values.
The algorithm that should be used to calculate percentiles
The percentiles that should be emitted
Additional context associated with this counter instance

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PercentilesEventCounter.Capacity
member.summary: Gets the number of raw signal values that can be buffer for each counter event

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PercentilesEventCounter.CounterType
member.summary: Gets the type of this counter instance

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PercentilesEventCounter.Dimension
member.summary: Gets the dimension of this counter instance

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PercentilesEventCounter.ToString
member.summary: Gets a textual summary for this counter instance

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PercentilesEventCounter.WriteMetric(System.Single)
member.summary: Writes 'value' to the stream of values tracked by the counter. This updates the sum and other statistics that will be logged on the next timer interval.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PercentilesEventCounter.WriteMetric(System.Double)
member.summary: Writes 'value' to the stream of values tracked by the counter. This updates the sum and other statistics that will be logged on the next timer interval.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PercentilesEventCounter.InternalBuffer.Flush
member.summary: Only one thread will every be able to process Flush. Flush is used to ensure that calls to TryEnqueue, which are still in flight and passed the entry barrier (index < capacity), can complete before starting to emit the payload
member.remarks: The synchornization mechanism depends on the behavior that each call to TryEnqueue for which the initial increment of this.index returns an index within the range of the buffer will eventually increase this.count as well after adding the measurement. So it is very important that this.count is always incremented when returning true.
member.returns: True if this call had any side effects that would require emitting payload. False if the buffer is empty or another call to Flush was triggering side effects. Every caller is responsible for triggering subsequent WritePayload if true is returned and the it is desired to not loose the telemetry in the current buffer (CounterGrup.ResetCounters) would intentionally ignore previous payload.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PercentilesEventCounter.InternalBuffer.TryEnqueue(System.Double)
member.summary: Attempts to enqueue a new measurement.
member.returns: True if the measurement could be added to the current buffer. False if the buffer is full to indicate to the caller that a new buffer needs to be initialized
member.remarks: The synchornization mechanism depends on the behavior that each call to TryEnqueue for which the initial increment of this.index returns an index within the range of the buffer will eventually increase this.count as well after adding the measurement. So it is very important that this.count is always incremented when returning true.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.PercentilesEventCounterPayloadType
member.summary: This is the payload that is sent in the with EventSource.Write

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition
member.summary: See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quantile for a descripton of the different modes

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.R1
member.summary: R1 - Inverse of empirical distribution function.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.SAS3
member.summary: SAS3 - Inverse of empirical distribution function.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.EmpiricalInvCDF
member.summary: EmpiricalInvCDF - Inverse of empirical distribution function.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.R2
member.summary: R2 - Inverse of empirical distribution function, but with averaging at discontinuities.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.SAS5
member.summary: SAS5 - Inverse of empirical distribution function, but with averaging at discontinuities.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.EmpiricalInvCDFAverage
member.summary: EmpiricalInvCDFAverage - Inverse of empirical distribution function, but with averaging at discontinuities.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.R3
member.summary: R3 - The observation numbered closest to Np. Here, h indicates rounding to the nearest integer, choosing the even integer in the case of a tie.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.SAS2
member.summary: SAS2 - The observation numbered closest to Np. Here, h indicates rounding to the nearest integer, choosing the even integer in the case of a tie.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.Nearest
member.summary: Nearest - The observation numbered closest to Np. Here, h indicates rounding to the nearest integer, choosing the even integer in the case of a tie.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.R4
member.summary: R4 - Linear interpolation of the empirical distribution function.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.SAS1
member.summary: SAS1 - Linear interpolation of the empirical distribution function.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.California
member.summary: California - Linear interpolation of the empirical distribution function.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.R5
member.summary: R5 - Piecewise linear function where the knots are the values midway through the steps of the empirical distribution function.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.Hydrology
member.summary: Hydrology - Piecewise linear function where the knots are the values midway through the steps of the empirical distribution function.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.Hazen
member.summary: Hazen - Piecewise linear function where the knots are the values midway through the steps of the empirical distribution function.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.R6
member.summary: R6 - Linear interpolation of the expectations for the order statistics for the uniform distribution on [0,1]. That is, it is the linear interpolation between points (ph, xh), where ph = h/(N+1) is the probability that the last of (N+1) randomly drawn values will not exceed the h-th smallest of the first N randomly drawn values.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.SAS4
member.summary: SAS4 - Linear interpolation of the expectations for the order statistics for the uniform distribution on [0,1]. That is, it is the linear interpolation between points (ph, xh), where ph = h/(N+1) is the probability that the last of (N+1) randomly drawn values will not exceed the h-th smallest of the first N randomly drawn values.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.Nist
member.summary: Nist - Linear interpolation of the expectations for the order statistics for the uniform distribution on [0,1]. That is, it is the linear interpolation between points (ph, xh), where ph = h/(N+1) is the probability that the last of (N+1) randomly drawn values will not exceed the h-th smallest of the first N randomly drawn values.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.Weibull
member.summary: Weibull - Linear interpolation of the expectations for the order statistics for the uniform distribution on [0,1]. That is, it is the linear interpolation between points (ph, xh), where ph = h/(N+1) is the probability that the last of (N+1) randomly drawn values will not exceed the h-th smallest of the first N randomly drawn values.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.SPSS
member.summary: SPSS - Linear interpolation of the expectations for the order statistics for the uniform distribution on [0,1]. That is, it is the linear interpolation between points (ph, xh), where ph = h/(N+1) is the probability that the last of (N+1) randomly drawn values will not exceed the h-th smallest of the first N randomly drawn values.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.R7
member.summary: R7 - Linear interpolation of the modes for the order statistics for the uniform distribution on [0,1].

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.Excel
member.summary: Excel - Linear interpolation of the modes for the order statistics for the uniform distribution on [0,1].

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.Mode
member.summary: Mode - Linear interpolation of the modes for the order statistics for the uniform distribution on [0,1].

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.S
member.summary: S - Linear interpolation of the modes for the order statistics for the uniform distribution on [0,1].

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.R8
member.summary: R8 - Linear interpolation of the approximate medians for order statistics.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.Median
member.summary: Median - Linear interpolation of the approximate medians for order statistics.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.Default
member.summary: Default - Linear interpolation of the approximate medians for order statistics.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.R9
member.summary: R9 - The resulting quantile estimates are approximately unbiased for the expected order statistics if x is normally distributed.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Extensions.Logging.QuantileDefinition.Normal
member.summary: Normal - The resulting quantile estimates are approximately unbiased for the expected order statistics if x is normally distributed.
